pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Creating Universal Numeric Fingerprints for Data // Computes a 'universal numeric fingerprint' ('UNF') for an R data object. 'UNF' is a hash or signature that can be used to uniquely identify (a version of) a rectangular dataset, or a subset thereof. 'UNF' can be used, in tandem with a 'DOI', to form a persistent citation to a versioned dataset.
